name: ReRemember
description:
My take on the theme "Amnesia" of the Weekly Game Jam 54.
Created in the time from Sunday, 22.07.2018 to Thursday, 26.07.2018 (Deadline Version) in Unity using only the basics and the credited assets for music and font.

The "ReRemember.zip" has been finished on 28.07. and can be seen as my personal deadline version. :)

I highly recommend downloading the standalone version for a better experience!

Story
You play as Fred and try to find your way through a house. Which is difficult as you seem to forget even the simplest of things.

 

Controls:
WASD: Move the character (W - Jump/Up, A - Left, S - Down, D - Right)
E / Enter:  Activate
Shift:  Hold to run /  Hit to skip current message
P: Take screenshot
ESCAPE / F1: Open main menu
ALT+ENTER: Toggle fullscreen
Mouse: No function

Best played in 1920x1080 or at least in an 16:9 resolution.

 

Credits
The font "Downfall" has been done by Eeve Somepx.
The Music track "Carpe Diem" by Kevin MacLeod licensed under Creative Commons: By Attribution 3.0 License.
